trans-unit.source: Represents the XSLT transform for a digital signature as defined by the W3C.
trans-unit.target: 如 W3C 所定義，表示數位簽章的 XSLT 轉換。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform> class allows you to address an XML document using an XSLT transformation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>類別可讓您解決使用 XSLT 轉換 XML 文件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXPathTransform>

trans-unit.source: This class uses XSLT to transform XML nodes into other XML nodes that you want to sign or encrypt.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別會使用 XSLT 來轉換成其他您想要簽署或加密的 XML 節點的 XML 節點。

trans-unit.source: Use the XmlDsigXsltTransform class to sign or encrypt specific parts of an XML document using an XSLT transformation.
trans-unit.target: 使用 XmlDsigXsltTransform 類別來簽署或加密使用 XSLT 轉換 XML 文件的特定部分。

trans-unit.source: The Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) that describes the XmlDsigXsltTransform class is defined by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXsltTransformUrl> field.
trans-unit.target: 描述 XmlDsigXsltTransform 類別統一資源識別元 (URI) 由定義<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXsltTransformUrl>欄位。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.SignedXml.XmlDsigXsltTransformUrl>

trans-unit.source: For more information about the XSLT transform, see Section 6.6.5 of the XMLDSIG specification, which is available from the W3C at www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細的 XSLT 轉換的詳細資訊，請參閱節 6.6.5 XMLDSIG 規格中，可從在 www.w3.org/TR/xmldsig-core/ W3C。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> class with comments, if specified.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref>註解，如果指定類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> to include comments; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>表示包括註解。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Returns an XML representation of the parameters of the <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object that are suitable to be included as subelements of an XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 傳回參數的 XML 表示法<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref>都適合用來為 XMLDSIG 的子元素所包含的物件<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: A list of the XML nodes that represent the transform-specific content needed to describe the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object in an XMLDSIG <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 代表特定轉換的內容說明目前所需的 XML 節點的清單<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref>中 XMLDSIG 物件<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前的輸出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件的類型必須是<xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 目前的輸出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Returns the output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object of type <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回目前的輸出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>類型的物件

trans-unit.source: The type of the returned object must be <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回物件的類型必須是<xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The type of the output to return.
trans-unit.target: 要傳回之輸出的類型。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Stream> is the only valid type for this parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream>是為此參數唯一有效的類型。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: The output of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object of type <xref:System.IO.Stream>.
trans-unit.target: 目前的輸出<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"> </xref> <xref:System.IO.Stream>.</xref:System.IO.Stream>類型的物件

trans-unit.source: The type parameter is not a object.
trans-unit.target: type 參數不是物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are valid inputs to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬於有效的輸入之型別的陣列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*>方法目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*>

trans-unit.source: The valid input types to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> are <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: 有效的輸入類型，以<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform>是<xref:System.IO.Stream>， <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>，和<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform>

trans-unit.source: An array of valid input types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object; you can pass only objects of one of these types to the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*> method of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 在目前有效的輸入類型的陣列<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref>物件; 您可以將只有其中一個這些類型的物件傳遞<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*>方法目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*>

trans-unit.source: Parses the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> object as transform-specific content of a <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element and configures the internal state of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object to match the <xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref> element.
trans-unit.target: 剖析指定<xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref>物件做為轉換特定內容的<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>項目，並設定目前的內部狀態<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref>物件以符合<xref uid="langword_csharp_<Transform>" name="<Transform>" href=""></xref>項目。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to process subelements of a `<Transform>` element.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來處理元素的子元素`<Transform>`項目。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"></xref> object that encapsulates an XSLT style sheet to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XmlNodeList"> </xref>封裝 XSLT 樣式表載入目前的物件<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: This style sheet is applied to the document loaded by the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*> method.
trans-unit.target: 這個樣式表套用至文件載入<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*>方法。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.LoadInput*>

trans-unit.source: The nodeList parameter is .
trans-unit.target: The nodeList parameter is .

trans-unit.source: -or- The nodeList parameter does not contain an object.
trans-unit.target: -或- nodeList 參數不包含物件。

trans-unit.source: Loads the specified input into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 將目前載入指定的輸入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: The type of the input object must be one of the types in the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.InputTypes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 輸入物件的類型必須是其中一個類型中<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.InputTypes%2A>屬性。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.InputTypes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The valid input types to <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform> are <xref:System.IO.Stream>, <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>, and <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>.
trans-unit.target: 有效的輸入類型，以<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform>是<xref:System.IO.Stream>， <xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>，和<xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeList> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform>

trans-unit.source: The input to load into the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 要載入到目前之輸入<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref>物件。

trans-unit.source: Gets an array of types that are possible outputs from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput*> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 取得屬於從可能的輸出之型別的陣列<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput*>方法目前<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput*>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.IO.Stream> is the only valid output type for <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IO.Stream>是<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform>.</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform>的唯一有效的輸出類型</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: An array of valid output types for the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object; only objects of one of these types are returned from the <xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput*> methods of the current <xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: 在目前有效的輸出型別的陣列<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref>物件，只有物件的下列其中一種會從傳回型別<xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput*>方法在目前的<xref href="System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform"></xref>物件。</xref:System.Security.Cryptography.Xml.XmlDsigXsltTransform.GetOutput*>
